panels.description: Number of payload jobs that have produced a block payload successfully.
panels.title: Payloads Built

panels.description: Time given to the builder to build a payload (block time).
panels.title: Block Time

panels.description: The total number of all transactions built across all payload jobs.
panels.title: Transactions Built

panels.description: The sum of all gas consumed by all transactions built across all payload jobs.
panels.title: Total Gas Built

panels.description: Total blob gas used by all blob transactions in all produced payloads.
panels.title: Total Blob Gas Built

panels.description: Total fees accumulated by all produced payloads.
panels.title: Total Fees

panels.description: Number of transactions in a produced payload.
panels.title: Transactions Per Payload

panels.description: Percentage of Payload Jobs that ended in successfully built payload.
panels.title: Payload Jobs Success Rate

panels.description: Amount of gas used by transactions in a produced payload.
panels.title: Gas per Payload

panels.description: Duration of a payload job from start to completion or failure.
panels.title: Payload Job Duration

panels.description: The percentage of gas utilized by transactions in a produced payload.
panels.title: Payload Gas Utilization

panels.description: Fees paid by transactions in produced payloads
panels.title: Fees per Payload (ETH)
